__e: Oh, 'cause I don't help people in need?
It just makes you realize that you can live your lives without each other.
What good is a hero if he doesn't help people who need him most?
I'm cutting as fast as I can, but the backseat driving isn't helping.
Doesn't really help when it comes to people that we're close to, people we want to be close to.
I tried therapy when my brother died, talking doesn't really help.
I don't suppose it helps if I say that I thought staying out of your life was the best thing for you.
I know what you're thinking, but I'm not asking you to do anything that doesn't help everyone in the long run.
AND IT DOESN'T HELP THAT THERE'S A ROOM FULL OF PEOPLE RIGHT OUTSIDE THE DOOR WHO KNOW EXACTLY
I mean, I could have been honest, but the truth never helps anyone' so I came up with a foolproof-cover.
Don't trust anybody, believe anybody, help anybody, and don't ask anybody for anything.
The only reason Rebecca's stuck around as long as she has is because she's a senator's daughter, which is really doing nothing for anybody these days.
My hanging around here is not helping you. And it's killing me.

you are mistaken! Speaking, foolishly, to a power that is greater than you are, though clearly it's no use to do so and as the stars roll on unstoppable, thus life rolls along the path to its accomplishment.
I'm not giving up the struggle... but if I'm sentenced to death... it wouldn't help the cause.
